Structs/PushNotifications.html#/s:17Push.name: publishToInterests(_:_:completion:)
Structs/PushNotifications.html#/s:17Push.abstract: Publish the given publishRequest to the specified interests.

Structs/PushNotifications.html#/s:17Push.name: publishToUsers(_:_:completion:)
Structs/PushNotifications.html#/s:17Push.abstract: Publish the given publishRequest to the specified users.

Structs/PushNotifications.html#/s:17Push.name: generateToken(_:completion:)
Structs/PushNotifications.html#/s:17Push.abstract: Creates a signed JWT for a user id.

Structs/PushNotifications.html#/s:17Push.name: deleteUser(_:completion:)
Structs/PushNotifications.html#/s:17Push.abstract: Contacts the Beams service to remove all the devices of the given user.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.name: interestsArrayContainsAnInvalidInterest(maxCharacters:)
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.abstract: The interests array contains at least one or more invalid interests.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.name: interestsArrayContainsTooManyInterests(maxInterests:)
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.abstract: The interests array exceeded the number of maximum interests allowed.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.name: usersArrayCannotContainEmptyString
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.abstract: The users array cannot contain any empty Strings.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.name: usersArrayContainsAnInvalidUser(maxCharacters:)
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.abstract: The users array contains at least one or more invalid users.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.name: usersArrayContainsTooManyUsers(maxUsers:)
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.abstract: The users array exceeded the number of maximum interests allowed.

Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.name: userIdInvalid(maxCharacters:)
Enums/PushNotificationsError.html#/s:17P.abstract: The userId is invalid (i.e. it is too many characters).
